question: IMF releases ___________ mn of Sri Lanka loan, recently.
explanation: International Monetory Fund (IMF) released its loan of $252 million to the island nation of Srilanka. This loan is a part of a deal of amount $1.5 billion that was to be loaned by the IMF to SriLanka. The move of price increase of fuel was welcomed. The cooking gas and lamps has doubled. The gasoline price has been increased by 15%. The restructuring of loss making SriLankan Airlines was proposed.
